Data Structures | Macros | Enumerations
Quad Serial Peripheral Interface (QSPI)
Stratify OS » Device Interface

Detailed Description

This module implements a hardware Quad SPI master.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ I_QSPI_COMMAND

#define I_QSPI_COMMAND

This tells the qspi bus to set a command from data to bus. The ctl argument to qspi_ioctl() is the word to put (not a pointer to qspi_attr_t).

The following example puts WRITE_ENABLE_CMD(write enable command)

ioctl(fd, I_QSPI_COMMAND, WRITE_ENABLE_CMD);

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ qspi_flag_t

enum qspi_flag_t
Enumerator
QSPI_FLAG_SET_MASTER 

Configure the QSPI as master

QSPI_FLAG_IS_READ_MEM_MAPPED_MODE 

Configure the QSPI as mem mapped mode(read only)

QSPI_FLAG_IS_CLK_HIGH_WHILE_CS 

Clk goes high while nCS is released, else low

QSPI_FLAG_IS_FLASH_ID_2 

use flash 2, else 1

QSPI_FLAG_IS_INSTRUCTION_1_LINE 

write command use one line instead 4

QSPI_FLAG_IS_INSTRUCTION_4_LINE 

write command use one line instead 4

QSPI_FLAG_IS_ADDRESS_8_BITS 

8-bit address, default 32

QSPI_FLAG_IS_ADDRESS_16_BITS 

16-bit address, default 32

QSPI_FLAG_IS_ADDRESS_24_BITS 

24-bit address, default 32

QSPI_FLAG_IS_ADDRESS_32_BITS 

24-bit address, default 32

QSPI_FLAG_IS_ADDRESS_1_LINE 

use addressed command

QSPI_FLAG_IS_ADDRESS_4_LINES 

use addressed command

QSPI_FLAG_IS_DATA_1_LINE 

use addressed command

QSPI_FLAG_IS_DATA_4_LINES 

use addressed command

QSPI_FLAG_READ_REGISTER 

use with QSPI_FLAG_IS_REGISTER_WIDTH_

QSPI_FLAG_WRITE_REGISTER 

use with QSPI_FLAG_IS_REGISTER_WIDTH_

QSPI_FLAG_IS_REGISTER_WIDTH_8 

use with QSPI_FLAG_READ_REGISTER or QSPI_FLAG_WRITE_REGISTER

QSPI_FLAG_IS_REGISTER_WIDTH_16 

use with QSPI_FLAG_READ_REGISTER or QSPI_FLAG_WRITE_REGISTER

QSPI_FLAG_IS_REGISTER_WIDTH_24 

use with QSPI_FLAG_READ_REGISTER or QSPI_FLAG_WRITE_REGISTER

QSPI_FLAG_IS_REGISTER_WIDTH_32 

use with QSPI_FLAG_READ_REGISTER or QSPI_FLAG_WRITE_REGISTER
